summary: The diff implements the requested phone country code + phone number fields in the contact form, adds client-side validation for both, extends the frontend submission payload, and updates the backend submission type/storage and admin retrieval to include phone fields. The diff also introduces additional, unrequested UI/content changes (including a WhatsApp CTA) and adds a backend migration module file.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend migration module/file and wired the actor to use it for data persistence/migration.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding a migration mechanism or additional backend modules/files; it only requires updating the existing Motoko actor in backend/main.mo to accept/store/return the new phone fields.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/mentioned a WhatsApp CTA in the site footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement and potentially conflicts with the stated non-goal of not adding WhatsApp messaging integrations (even if this is only a CTA/link, it is still WhatsApp-related functionality/content not asked for).

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple unrequested copy/styling/content changes across landing page sections (hero/offers/contact/footer/reviews), including profanity/emojis and updated marketing text.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is scoped to adding required phone fields and wiring them through validation/submission/storage; these broader content changes are not requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (LandingPage.tsx, HeroSection.tsx, TripAdvisorCta.tsx, OffersSection.tsx, ReviewsSection.tsx, ContactSection.tsx, Footer.tsx, curatedReviews.ts, index.css, tailwind.config.js)
